tweet: #Nigerians have all heard the @SPNigeria,"He will pass any bill from @MBuhari"If we do not have a comprehensive electoral Act under this govt,If we do not have a comprehensive #policereform bill,If we do not have a special anti corruption tribunal, we will conclude Buhari #Failed
